descriptions.default: Flickering lights reveal a sparking droid blocking the east tunnel. A diagnostic tool lies on the floor.
descriptions.tool_picked_up: The droid whirs weakly as you raise the tool.
descriptions.droid_fixed: The corridor to the Docking Bay is now clear.

descriptions.default: Debris floats with no gravity, near a shattered window. An energy crystal is lodged in the wall.
descriptions.crystal_taken: The escape pod hatch glows green - Almost there.
descriptions.final: The escape pod is ready for launch!

descriptions.default: The escape pod is ready to launch!

diagnostic_tool.name: Diagnostic Tool
diagnostic_tool.description: A handheld device for repairing electronic systems.

use.malfunctioning_droid: You use the diagnostic tool on the droid, rebooting its systems.

energy_crystal.name: Energy Crystal
energy_crystal.description: A glowing crystal pulsing with energy.

pickup.message: The crystal vibrates in your palm. You drop to the ground as the gravity resets!

malfunctioning_droid.name: Malfunctioning Droid
malfunctioning_droid.description: A damaged maintenance droid is blocking the corridor.
malfunctioning_droid.fixed_message: Droid reboots! It salutes and shuffles aside.
malfunctioning_droid.hint: Maybe I can use something to fix this droid...

zero_gravity.name: Zero Gravity Field
zero_gravity.description: The escape pod's hatch is lodged shut, thanks to the broken gravity generators.
zero_gravity.hint: I need to restore power to the gravity generators...
